servers.name: all-types
servers.description: Demonstrates various tool parameter types supported by MCP

servers.name: bad-param
servers.description: Server with an intentionally malformed parameter name

servers.name: big-response
servers.description: Server that returns large responses

servers.name: broken-tool
servers.description: Server with intentionally broken tool

servers.name: crash-on-startup
servers.description: Server that crashes on startup

servers.name: combined
servers.description: Server with tools and resources

servers.name: duplicate-names
servers.description: Server with duplicate names for resources

servers.name: dynamic-tools
servers.description: Server with dynamically generated tools

servers.name: elicitation
servers.description: Server demonstrating MCP elicitation feature - requests user information through structured forms

servers.name: enum-param
servers.description: Tool has enum string parameter

servers.name: integer-anyof-bug
servers.description: Reproduces Cursor's integer validation bug with anyOf schema - parameters with {"anyOf": [{"type": "integer"}, {"type": "null"}]} fail validation with 'got number' error

servers.name: env-check
servers.description: Checks for SHOULD_RUN environment variable being passed properly

servers.name: env-echo
servers.description: Echoes the environment variables

servers.name: image
servers.description: Tool returns an image of sonic the hedgehog

servers.name: instructions
servers.description: Server with instructions and a makeRequest tool that returns success for value 42

servers.name: long-description
servers.description: Publicize a very long description configured via env var

servers.name: long-running
servers.description: Server that sends progress notifications every 2 seconds for a 20-second task

servers.name: many-resources
servers.description: Server with multiple resources

servers.name: many-tools
servers.description: Server with 100 tools that each return 'ack'

servers.name: math
servers.description: Server with basic math function tools (add, subtract, multiply, divide, power, sqrt, factorial)

servers.name: missing-type
servers.description: Server with tools missing the required 'type' field in parameter schemas

servers.name: named
servers.description: Server with configurable name via MCP_SERVER_NAME environment variable

servers.name: number-param
servers.description: Tool with a number parameter

servers.name: optional-param
servers.description: Tool has an optional param

servers.name: pattern-param
servers.description: Tool has a parameter with a pattern match

servers.name: ping
servers.description: A simple server that responds with 'pong'

servers.name: prompts
servers.description: Server with two prompts - one static greeting and one dynamic story generator

servers.name: resource
servers.description: Resource server implementation

servers.name: resource-lister
servers.description: Server that publishes 5 resources and has a tool to list them

servers.name: root-echo
servers.description: Server that demonstrates MCP roots functionality by echoing back the roots provided by the client

servers.name: session-management
servers.description: HTTP server that implements MCP session management behavior

servers.name: stderr
servers.description: Server that logs to stderr

servers.name: stdout
servers.description: Server that logs to stdout

servers.name: structured-output
servers.description: Demonstrates structuredContent responses with a simple echo tool

servers.name: oauth-repro
servers.description: Reproduces OAuth 2.0 flow issues with proper discovery endpoints - runs resource server on port 3001 and auth server on port 3002

servers.name: oauth-debug
servers.description: OAuth debugging server with comprehensive logging and endpoint tracking - runs resource server on port 3003 and auth server on port 3004

servers.name: oauth-callback-test
servers.description: OAuth callback testing server that simulates Cursor 1.4.x endpoint discovery bugs - runs on port 3005

servers.name: oauth-edge-case
servers.description: OAuth server with configurable edge cases to trigger discovery bugs - resource server on port 3006, auth server on port 3007

servers.name: oauth-bug-trigger
servers.description: Specialized server designed to reproduce the exact Cursor 1.4.x OAuth discovery bug - resource server on port 3008, auth server on port 3009

servers.name: oauth-token-refresh
servers.description: OAuth server with short access token expiration (30s default) to test automatic token refresh - resource server on port 3010, auth server on port 3011

servers.name: gpt5-breaker
servers.description: Server with SQL query execution tool using complex parameter validation

servers.name: sse-timeout
servers.description: Streamable HTTP server that establishes SSE connections but times out after 30 seconds to test client reconnection

servers.name: session-inactivity
servers.description: Streamable HTTP server that expires sessions after 30 seconds of inactivity to test session management

servers.name: dual-content
servers.description: Demonstrates different outputs for structuredContent and content in the same response

servers.name: everything
servers.description: Comprehensive server testing all MCP features - tools with/without params, resources, prompts, elicitation, dynamic tools, roots echo, env vars
